response.overview: When a deadly airborne virus threatens to wipe out the northeastern United States, teacher Elliot Moore and his wife Alma flee from contaminated cities into the countryside in a fight to discover the truth. Is it terrorism, the accidental release of some toxic military bio weapon -- or something even more sinister?
response.tagline: We've sensed it. We've seen the signs. Now...it's happening.
response.title: The Happening

titles.title: วิบัติการณ์สยองโลก

cast.name: Alison Folland
cast.character: Woman Reading on Bench with Hair Pin
